mediautil.gen
Class Log

java.lang.Object
  mediautil.gen.Log

public class Log
extends Object

This class provides a place to set the debug level which ImageUtil classes refer to while printing messages.

Field Summary
static int debugLevel
          Current debug Level Setting
static int LEVEL_DEBUG
          Debug Level which specifies that all messages including debug messages are to be printed.
static int LEVEL_ERROR
          Debug Level which specifies that only error messages are to be printed
static int LEVEL_INFO
          Debug Level which specifies that error, warning and informational messages are to be printed.
static int LEVEL_NONE
          Debug Level which specifies that no messages are to be printed
static int LEVEL_WARNING
          Debug Level which specifies that only error and warning messages are to be printed

public static final int LEVEL_INFO
Debug Level which specifies that error, warning and informational messages are to be printed. Debug messages are not printed.
